# DNS static record types fixture
# Tests all record types supported by dns static command

# A record - hostname to IPv4
dns static a pc1.example.com 192.168.1.10
dns static a server.local 10.0.0.1 ttl=3600

# AAAA record - hostname to IPv6
dns static aaaa pc1.example.com 2001:db8::1
dns static aaaa ipv6host.local 2001:db8::100 ttl=7200

# PTR record - reverse lookup
dns static ptr 192.168.1.10 pc1.example.com
dns static ptr 10.0.0.1 server.local

# CNAME record - alias
dns static cname mail.example.com mail2.example.com
dns static cname www.local server.local

# MX record - mail exchange
dns static mx example.com mail.example.com
dns static mx local.domain smtp.local.domain

# NS record - name server
dns static ns example.com ns1.example.com
dns static ns internal.zone ns.internal.zone

# Simple format (without record type)
dns static myhost.local 192.168.1.100
dns static router.home 192.168.1.1
